text: Arau tomaloke hajja arau omaraaha allahara babe'i purna karaa. Eteke yadi tomaloke badhapraapta horaa tente sahajalabhya hada`yi pradana karaa, arau hada`yi tara nirdista sthanata noparaalaike tomaloke mura nukhuraaba. Kintu tomalokara majara konoba'i yadi asustha haya athaba murata kastadayaka kiba haya tente chiyama athaba chadakba na'iba pasu jabeha karai tara phida'iya diba lagiba. Eteke yetiya tomaloke niraapada haâ€™ba tetiya tomalokara majata yiye omaraaka hajjara lagata mila'i tamattu karaiba bicarae, si sahajalabhya hada`yi jabeha karaiba. Kintu yadi konoba'i e'ito karaiba noraarae, tente tara babe hajjara samayata tini dina arau gharata ubhati ahi sata dina, e'i purna daha dina tara chiyama palana karaiba lagiba. E'ito kerala tara babe yara paraiyalabarga machajidula haraamara adhibasi nahaya; arau tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau jani thoraa ye, niscaya allaha sasti pradanata ati kathora
